        Cached FileStore from path

      • spins

        public final java.lang.Boolean spins
        Cached result of Lucene's IOUtils.spins on path. This is a trilean value: null means we could not determine it (we are not running on Linux, or we hit an exception trying), True means the device possibly spins and False means it does not.
